verses.verse: Moreover, when you shall <S%H5307>divide<s%> by lot the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> you shall <S%H7311>offer<s%> an <S%H8641>oblation<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> an <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion of the <S%H776>land:<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> shall be the <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> reeds, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> shall be <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holy<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>borders<s%> thereof <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

Of <S%H2088>this<s%> there shall be for the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> in length, with <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> <S%H7251>square<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about; and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about for the <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> thereof.

And of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%> shall you <S%H4058>measure<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand:<s%> and in it shall be the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> and the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.

The <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> which shall <S%H7131>come<s%> <S%H7131>near<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and it shall be a <S%H4725>place<s%> for their <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and an <S%H4720>holy<s%> place for the <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>

And the <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of <S%H753>length,<s%> and the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of breadth <S%H7341><s%>shall also the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> for <S%H1992>themselves,<s%> for a <S%H272>possession<s%> for <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3957>chambers.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>appoint<s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H753>long,<s%> <S%H5980>over<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion: it shall be for the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And a portion shall be for the <S%H5387>prince<s%> on the one side and on the <S%H2088>other<s%> side of the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion, and of the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> portion, and <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H272>possession<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> from the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and from the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H6921>eastward:<s%> and the <S%H753>length<s%> shall be <S%H5980>over<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2506>portions,<s%> from the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H1366>border<s%> to the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>

In the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be his <S%H272>possession<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and my <S%H5387>princes<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3238>oppress<s%> my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and the rest of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall they <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Let it <S%H7227>suffice<s%> you, O <S%H5387>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>spoil,<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6666>justice,<s%> <S%H7311>take<s%> <S%H7311>away<s%> your <S%H1646>exactions<s%> from my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H3976>balances,<s%> and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H374>ephah,<s%> and a <S%H6664>just<s%> <S%H1324>bath.<s%>

The <S%H374>ephah<s%> and the <S%H1324>bath<s%> shall be of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8506>measure,<s%> that the <S%H1324>bath<s%> may <S%H5375>contain<s%> the <S%H4643>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H2563>homer,<s%> and the <S%H374>ephah<s%> the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H2563>homer:<s%> the <S%H4971>measure<s%> thereof shall be after the <S%H2563>homer.<s%>

And the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> shall be <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1626>gerahs:<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> <S%H6235>fifteen<s%> <S%H2568><s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> shall be your <S%H4488>maneh.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is the <S%H8641>oblation<s%> that you shall <S%H7311>offer;<s%> the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of an <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and you shall give the <S%H8341>sixth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of an <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H8184>barley:<s%>

Concerning the <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> the <S%H1324>bath<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> you shall offer the <S%H4643>tenth<s%> part of a <S%H1324>bath<s%> out of the <S%H3734>cor,<s%> <S%H4480>which<s%> is an <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1324>baths;<s%> for <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1324>baths<s%> are an <S%H2563>homer:<s%>

And <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7716>lamb<s%> out of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> out of two <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> out of the <S%H4945>fat<s%> <S%H4945>pastures<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and for <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings, to make <S%H3722>reconciliation<s%> for them, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>give<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8641>oblation<s%> for the <S%H5387>prince<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it shall be the <S%H5387>prince's<s%> part to give <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> and meat offerings, and <S%H5262>drink<s%> offerings, in the <S%H2282>feasts,<s%> and in the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moons,<s%> and in the <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4150>solemnities<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> he shall <S%H3559>prepare<s%> the <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the meat offering, and the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and the <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings, to make <S%H3722>reconciliation<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> In the <S%H7223>first<s%> month, in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H2398>cleanse<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary:<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and on the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of the <S%H5835>settle<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and on the <S%H4201>posts<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

And <S%H3651>so<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%> for <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> that <S%H7686>errs,<s%> and for him that is <S%H6612>simple:<s%> so shall you <S%H3722>reconcile<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> month, in the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> a <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> bread shall be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>

And on that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H3559>prepare<s%> for himself and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> a <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> he shall <S%H3559>prepare<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>blemish<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and a <S%H8163>kid<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

And he shall <S%H3559>prepare<s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H352>ram,<s%> and an <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> for an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

In the <S%H7651>seventh<s%> month, in the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> the like in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> according to the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, according to the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and according to the meat offering, and according to the <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
